thread.title: Some People Are Not Happy That Casey Affleck Won A Golden Globe
thread.title_full: Some People Are Not Happy That Casey Affleck Won A Golden Globe

author: Krystie Lee Yandoli
title: Some People Are Not Happy That Casey Affleck Won A Golden Globe
text:
View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10287923 2. In the film, the actor plays a character named Lee Chandler who grieves a lot of loss and struggles through family tragedies. View this image ›
Amazon Studios / Via youtube.com ID: 10287989 3. After Affleck’s win, some people took to Twitter, citing the sexual harassment allegations that were brought against the actor in 2010. View this image ›
Twitter: @JulieSLalonde ID: 10288052 View this image ›
Twitter: @SorayaMcDonald ID: 10288058 View this image ›
Twitter: @rgay ID: 10288204 6. As well as white privilege. View this image ›
Twitter: @britticisms ID: 10288030 View this image ›
Twitter: @yungjenz ID: 10288095 8. During awards season, Affleck hasn’t commented much on the allegations, but he did tell the New York Times magazine in November, “It was settled to the satisfaction of all. I was hurt and upset — I am sure all were — but I am over it,” he wrote in an email. “It was an unfortunate situation — mostly for the innocent bystanders of the families of those involved.” View this image ›
Frazer Harrison / Getty Images ID: 10288159 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
